availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George N. Sizemore (Christian County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of William Sizemore and Unity Sizemore. Married to Amanda Sizemore. Father of Levia Sizemore, John M. Sizemore, and Florida Sizemore. Resident of Christian County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Christian County in 1860. Farmer in Christian County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 466B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian Country, p. 603.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian Country, Scates Mill, p. 569B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Christian County, KY, August 1863, p. 49.
"George Nelson Sizemore (1837-1919)," Find A Grave, Memorial #29341923, accessed January 25, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/29341923.
